title: Submission of the Report on Annual Economic Review of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka for the year 2024
decision_details: - In terms of section 80(3) of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka Act, No. 16 of 2023 the Minister in-charge of the subject of Finance should submit a Report on the status of economy prevailed during the financial year within a period of four-month at the end of each financial year, to Parliament. Accordingly, the Report on Economic Review of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka for the year 2024 prepared by the Central Bank of Sri Lanka has been submitted to the President. The said Report provides a review of the macroeconomic trends in Sri Lanka, the status and the key developments of the financial system and the policies of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Hon. President, in his capacity as the Minister of Finance, Planning and Economic Development to present the Report on Annual Economic Review of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka for the year 2024, to Parliament, was approved by the Cabinet.
